1402.name: Unknown
1402.message:
There is a problem with the disc drive.

For help, make a note of the error code and visit
support.nintendo.com.
1402.long_description: Optical Disc Drive error - may indicate a scratched or dirty disc, or a problem with the disc drive itself.
1402.short_solution: Make sure the optical disc is inserted correctly and is clean.
1402.long_solution: Make sure the optical disc is inserted correctly and is clean. Also ensure the disc drive is not blocked or obstructed and spins the disc properly.
